statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(age) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers WHERE location='New York'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY gender DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customers.name, purchases.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, gender, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price < 100
SELECT city_name, state FROM locations
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.city = locations.city_name WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT city_name, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'New York' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, gender FROM customers GROUP BY gender ORDER BY average_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;

SELECT customer_name, category, price FROM Customers INNER JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 100 ORDER BY Orders.total_amount ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, Purchases.quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN Purchases ON Orders.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 3;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT p.name, p.category, SUM(pr.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN purchases pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id GROUP BY p.name, p.category;
SELECT c.name, d.education_level, d.occupation FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE c.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
